dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependent_to.name: perl-test-cleannamespaces
dependent_to.description:
This module lets you check your module's namespaces for imported
functions you might have forgotten to remove

dependent_to.name: perl-test-most
dependent_to.description: Most commonly needed test functions and features.

dependent_to.name: perl-cpan-meta-check
dependent_to.description:
This module verifies if requirements described in a CPAN::Meta object
are present..

dependent_to.name: perl-dbd-mysql
dependent_to.description: MySQL driver for the Perl5 Database Interface (DBI)
